value:
$nMPID_エリーゼ|These Hoshidan sweets are called
manju, right? They're so springy!
I wonder if Nohr has the right flour...

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Let's get something for your brothers
too, Sakura! Ooo, I know! How about
some of those berry-filled manju?

$nMPID_サクラ|Elise... We won't have enough sweets
to give for gifts if you keep eating
them all...

$nMPID_サクラ|Mmm, they really smell like peaches!
And the colored wrappers were
definitely worth the effort.

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Mmm... I love these! So sweet, and
just the right amount of tart!

Hi! Want to come celebrate the Day
of Devotion? We'll wait for you at
$Nf's castle!

$nMPID_エリーゼ|See how happy everyone looks?
Love conquers all, Sakura!

$nMPID_エリーゼ|You're always there to support me.
I love that about you, Sakura!
$nMPID_サクラ|It's all right, Elise! I-I'm here with you.

$nMPID_サクラ|Thank you for all you do for us! Elise
and I will do everything we can to
make this festival great.

I'm Princess Elise of Nohr, and this is
Princess Sakura of Hoshido! We're
here for the Day of Devotion festival!

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Looks like you got a whole pile of
gifts for the Day of Devotion
festival, $Nu!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Even just counting the Heroes alone,
it's going to be hard to find the time
to thank everyone.$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|That's a good point. Sakura and I
both have big families, but that's
nothing compared to this.$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Would you like some help? Elise and I
could assist you in shopping for and
doling out thank-you gifts.$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|Hey, great idea! That sounds like lots
of fun!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Hehe... I was hoping you'd say that.$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|We'll be the greatest thank-you team
Askr has ever seen! All right then,
let's get to it!
$nMPID_二人|Thank you!
$nMPID_二人|Together! Yes!
$nMPID_エリーゼ|Forever grateful!
$nMPID_サクラ|Please accept this!
Are you...unhappy?
$nMPID_サクラ|Do your best!
$nMPID_サクラ|Please be careful!
"A gift from us!" "With love."
"Elise!" "Let's go!"
"I'm glad we get to enjoy the festival together!" "Me too. It's a lot of fun."
Um...
Ready to go!
Special delivery!
$nMPID_サクラ|Oh, don’t forget about this one...
$nMPID_エリーゼ|And the last gift goes to...
Whew... That was the last gift, right?

$nMPID_サクラ|I think so. Getting presents for
everyone in both our families
has been a lot of work.

$nMPID_エリーゼ|I know! I was worried we'd run out of
good ideas by the end.
$nMPID_サクラ|Hehe... It's been fun, though.

I love to imagine everyone's happy
faces as I pick out each gift.

It's so rewarding that...that it almost
feels like a gift to myself.

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Hehe, that's adorable, Sakura. It says
a lot about you as a person too. That
generosity's why I like you so much!

$nMPID_サクラ|Oh no, you don't have to say that.
I wasn't fishing for a compliment...

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Hehe, I know. I mean it, though.
You're a great friend. Which
reminds me—here!

$nMPID_サクラ|Wh-what's this? Did you get
a present for me?

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Yep! Just my way of saying thanks
for being you. I hope we'll always
be friends.

$nMPID_サクラ|I know we will! Actually, I was also...
I mean...I got you this.

$nMPID_エリーゼ|Wow, you got me a gift too?! Great
minds really do think alike!

$nMPID_サクラ|Well... I was also thinking about what
a great friend you are.

You mean a lot to me. I love
you, Elise.
